name: YesBots
description:
“Welcome to the YesBots testing server, where we put new military AI through their paces.”
“Get ready for a safer future, in the cold, digital hands of our AI!”
- YesBots promotional website (2020)

Machine learning is all the rage nowadays, but what does it feel like to be an AI, having to work out everything out by trial and error? This top-down shoot-‘em’-up attempts to capture that feeling. Fight hoards of engaging enemies in challenging combat, with ten levels and a compelling narrative. Follow the AI “MorpheusV8” through his trials, and witness the trouble which comes with being an underpaid AI technician just trying to track down those last few bugs.
